text: 22:8 1 Atriviba 5:3; 1 Eghaghaniba 28:3Ezɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God kamaghɨn na mɨgei, ‘Devit, nɨ na bagh Dɨpenitamɨn ingaran kogham. Nɨ mɨdorozir avɨribagh amua gumazir avɨribav suagharɨki. Kɨ nɨn garima, nɨ bar gumazir avɨribav soghezɨ me ariaghire. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, nɨ ingangarir kam damuan kɨ aghua.
